abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Legal and Judicial
            Implementation and Institutional Support (LJIIS) Project is
            to contribute to improving judicial efficiency and
            effectiveness and the business climate in FYR Macedonia by:
            (i) enhancing ministerial and judicial capacity to
            systematically implement the Government's Judicial
            Reform Strategy and key laws; and (ii) improving judicial
            infrastructure. The extension is needed to allow full
            disbursement of loan funds for the construction of the
            building. The costs of the remaining construction (EUR
            5,051,848) exceed available loan funds for the construction
            (EUR 1,763,730) and Government funds will be needed to
            finalize the building. Given the recent reduction in
            counterpart funds for Bank projects by the Government of FYR
            Macedonia and the lack of an explicit commitment by the
            Ministry of Finance to expand Government co-funding from
            currently budgeted EUR 1 million to the required estimated
            amount of EUR 3,288,118 the risk of closing the project
            before the completion of the Skopje criminal court building
            is moderately high.
